page_content: The page provides information on various platforms used for vocational training, including access details and functionalities.
The page provides information on tax-related matters in the Canton of Luzern, including digital tax filing options.
The page serves as a glossary for terms related to vocational training and education.
The page discusses various IT solutions implemented by the DIIN, including software for Covid-19 vaccination centers and e-Government authentication solutions.
The page discusses vocational training in public administration, focusing on learning objectives and documentation.
The page outlines the structure and objectives of inter-company courses in public administration.
The page discusses the mandatory use of an Extranet platform for vocational training starting in 2023, outlining its features and requirements.
